briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_INTERFACE_TYPE Used for selecting electrical interface with specific electrical pin and signal quality.

detaileddescription.para: No Error detected
Failure detected
SNR lower than threshold
Link training timeout

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_FAILURE_STATUS Used for Link Training failure status and error codes.

detaileddescription.para: Receiver not trained
Receiver trained

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_RX_STATUS Used for receiver status for link training.

PRBS is locked, but there are errors

Enable PRBS Transmitter

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_CONFIG PRBS configuration to enable transmitter, receiver or both.

detaileddescription.para: Failover mode disable
Configure Failover mode on primary port
Configure Failover mode on secondary port

briefdescription.para: Attribute data for SAI_PORT_CONNECTOR_ATTR_FAILOVER_MODE Used for Failover mode configuration on port.
List of Queues for the port.
Number of Scheduler groups on port.
List of Scheduler groups for the port.
The sum of the headroom size of the ingress priority groups belonging to this port should not exceed the SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_MAXIMUM_HEADROOM_SIZE value.

detaileddescription.para: This attribute is applicable only for per-port, per-PG headroom model (which means SAI_BUFFER_POOL_ATTR_XOFF_SIZE is zero)
For the platforms which don't have this limitation, 0 should be returned.

briefdescription.para: Query list of supported port speed(full-duplex) in Mbps.
Query list of supported port FEC mode.
Query list of Supported HALF-Duplex speed in Mbps.
Query port supported flow control mode.
Query port supported asymmetric pause mode.
Query list of Advertised remote port speed (Full-Duplex) in Mbps.
Query list of Advertised remote port FEC control.
Query list of Remote Port's Advertised HALF-Duplex speed in Mbps.
Query Remote port Advertised flow control mode.
Query Remote port Advertised asymmetric pause mode.
Query Remote port Advertised MEDIA type.
Query Remote port Advertised OUI Code.
List of port's lanes eye values.

detaileddescription.para: If port is down, the returned value should be zero. If auto negotiation is on, the returned value should be the negotiated speed.
On get, returns the configured port speed.

briefdescription.para: Query/Configure list of Advertised port speed (Full-Duplex) in Mbps.

detaileddescription.para: Used when auto negotiation is on. Empty list means all supported values are enabled.

briefdescription.para: Query/Configure list of Advertised port FEC Mode.
Query/Configure list of Advertised HALF-Duplex speed in Mbps.
Query/Configure Port's Advertised flow control mode.
Query port's Advertised asymmetric pause mode.

detaileddescription.para: Organizationally Unique Identifier for 25G/50G auto negotiation. Default is 0x6A737D for Ethernet Consortium
Untagged ingress frames are tagged with Port VLAN ID (PVID).

briefdescription.para: Dropping of untagged frames on ingress.
Dropping of tagged frames on ingress.
Enable flood (unknown unicast or unknown multicast) storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable broadcast storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set Policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable multicast storm control policer on port.

detaileddescription.para: Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for ingress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an ingress ACL table or ACL group on a port. Enable/Update ingress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable ingress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for egress ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an egress ACL tables or ACL group on a port. Enable/Update egress ACL table or ACL group filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable egress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for ingress MACsec ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an ingress MACsec ACL table on a port. Enable/Update ingress MACsec ACL table filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable ingress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for egress MACsec ACL object.

detaileddescription.para: Bind (or unbind) an egress MACsec ACL tables on a port. Enable/Update egress MACsec ACL table filtering by assigning the list of valid object id. Disable egress filtering by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID in the attribute value.
Enable ingress mirroring by assigning list of mirror session object id as attribute value, disable ingress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist.
Enable egress mirroring by assigning list of mirror session object id as attribute value Disable egress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist.
Enable ingress sampling by assigning samplepacket object id Disable ingress sampling by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID as attribute value.
Enable egress sampling by assigning samplepacket object id Disable egress sampling by assigning SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID as attribute value.
Enable sample ingress mirroring by assigning list of mirror object ids Disable sample ingress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist
Enable sample egress mirroring by assigning list of mirror object ids Disable sample egress mirroring by assigning object_count as 0 in objlist
Set policer id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable policer on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable DOT1P -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust Dot1p, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable DOT1P -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust Dot1p, map ID should be added/removed on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable DSCP -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust DSCP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable DSCP -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust DSCP, map ID should be added/removed on port.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC -> Queue MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map, i.e. all packets to queue 0.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> DOT1P MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> DSCP MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map.
Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map

briefdescription.para: Enable PFC Priority -> Priority Group MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map
Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map

briefdescription.para: Scheduler for port, Default no limits.

detaileddescription.para: SAI_SCHEDULER_ATTR_MAX_BANDWIDTH_RATE & SAI_SCHEDULER_ATTR_MAX_BANDWIDTH_BURST_RATE attributes alone valid. Rest will be ignored.
There can be up to SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_INGRESS_BUFFER_POOL_NUM profiles.
There can be up to SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_EGRESS_BUFFER_POOL_NUM profiles.

briefdescription.para: Combined or separate Bit vectors for port PFC RX/TX.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for combined RX/TX control mode

briefdescription.para: Bit vector enable/disable port PFC RX.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for separate RX/TX control mode

briefdescription.para: Bit vector enable/disable port PFC TX.

detaileddescription.para: Valid from bit 0 to bit 7, for separate RX/TX control mode
Value Range SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_PORT_USER_META_DATA_RANGE.
Needs to be deprecated. Isolation group can be used instead.
Traffic ingressing on this port and egressing out of the ports in the given port list will be dropped.

Port can require different hardware configuration based on the attached media type, cable length etc. A Profile ID maps to a Port Hardware configuration settings that needs to be applied on the Port. This attribute need not be implemented and can be ignored if the port doesn't require any specific hardware settings based on media type/cable.
Energy Efficient Ethernet(EEE) is an IEEE 802.3az standard aiming to reduce power consumption on Ethernet ports (native copper ports). Enable the EEE on port level.
Time (in microseconds) to move to Low power state (No traffic), at the end of which MAC transitions to Low power state. Max value set more benefit.
Time (in microseconds) to wait before transmitter is leaving Low Power Mode State. Min value set avoid latency.

briefdescription.para: List of port pools for the port.

detaileddescription.para: Packets ingressing on the port should not be forwarded to the members present in the isolation group.The isolation group type should be SAI_ISOLATION_GROUP_TYPE_PORT.

Enable/Disable packet transmission of a port. When packet transmission is disabled on a port, packets are still subject to regular ingress and egress admission control to determine the actions on a packet: whether it is dropped (immediately or after timeout), or whether it is kept in buffers internal to the switch before packet transmission is enabled on the port.

briefdescription.para: Port bind point for TAM object.

detaileddescription.para: Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes pre-emphasis values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes idriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

Deprecated. Use SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT_SERDES List of port serdes ipredriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Configure PTP mode on the port.

detaileddescription.para: Used when auto negotiation is on. Empty list means all supported values are enabled.

briefdescription.para: Configure port reference clock in hertz.
Serdes object ID for the port.
Link training failure status and error codes.
Status whether the receiver trained or not trained to receive data.

detaileddescription.para: PRBS configuration to enable transmitter, receiver or both
PRBS lock status: 1 for locked, 0 for unlocked
PRBS unlocked status since last read: 1 for lock loss, 0 for no lock loss
Auto negotiation (AN) done state: 0 for AN in progress, 0 for AN done

briefdescription.para: Enable EXP -> TC MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust EXP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_MPLS_EXP_TO_TC_MAP.

briefdescription.para: Enable EXP -> COLOR MAP on port.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. To enable/disable trust EXP, map ID should be added/removed on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_MPLS_EXP_TO_COLOR_MAP.

briefdescription.para: Enable TC AND COLOR -> EXP MAP.

detaileddescription.para: Map id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID to disable map on port. Default no map. If present overrides SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_QOS_TC_AND_COLOR_TO_MPLS_EXP_MAP.
Signifies if the fabric port is attached
Signifies the attached switch type

Signifies the attached port index

briefdescription.para: PFC pause duration for RX and TX per PFC priority [uint64_t].

detaileddescription.para: RX pause duration for certain priority is a the duration quanta in ingress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame received by the switch). While TX pause duration for certain priority is the duration quanta in egress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame sent by the switch).
SAI port stat PFC 0 tx duration

briefdescription.para: PFC pause duration for RX and TX per PFC priority in micro seconds [uint64_t].

detaileddescription.para: RX pause duration for certain priority is a the duration in micro seconds converted from quanta in ingress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame received by the switch). While TX pause duration for certain priority is the duration in micro seconds converted from quanta in egress pause frame for that priority (a pause frame sent by the switch).

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes pre-emphasis values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.
List of port serdes idriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.
List of port serdes ipredriver values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR PRE1 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir precursor1 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR PRE2 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir precursor2 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR PRE3 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir precursor3 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR MAIN filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir maincursor tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR POST1 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir postcursor1 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR POST2 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir postcursor2 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR POST3 filter.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir postcursor3 tap-filter values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.

briefdescription.para: Port serdes control TX FIR attenuation.

detaileddescription.para: List of port serdes TX fir attn values. The values are of type sai_u32_list_t where the count is number lanes in a port and the list specifies list of values to be applied to each lane.
Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: Configure the failover mode on port.

detaileddescription.para: Custom range base value
End of custom range base

briefdescription.para: Defines the operational status of the port.
Breakout Mode types based on number of SerDes lanes used in a port.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_INTERFACE_TYPE Used for selecting electrical interface with specific electrical pin and signal quality.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_FAILURE_STATUS Used for Link Training failure status and error codes.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_RX_STATUS Used for receiver status for link training.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_ATTR_PRBS_CONFIG PRBS configuration to enable transmitter, receiver or both.
Attribute data for SAI_PORT_CONNECTOR_ATTR_FAILOVER_MODE Used for Failover mode configuration on port.
Attribute Id in sai_set_port_attribute() and sai_get_port_attribute() calls.
Port counter IDs in sai_get_port_stats() call.
